data.name: Pangea Survival Demo
data.detailed_description:
In this demo, you will be able to test our major features on many species of dinosaurs, over 30 in total.
Fight, to earn your food! Search, across long distances for water! Defend, yourself against the most powerful creatures to walk this planet!
In the Pangea Survival Demo you can get a preview on our smaller island Gondwana, and learn the upsides and downsides of being in different biomes, and the threats they produce: Heat, cold, apex predators, and so much more!
data.about_the_game:
In this demo, you will be able to test our major features on many species of dinosaurs, over 30 in total.
Fight, to earn your food! Search, across long distances for water! Defend, yourself against the most powerful creatures to walk this planet!
In the Pangea Survival Demo you can get a preview on our smaller island Gondwana, and learn the upsides and downsides of being in different biomes, and the threats they produce: Heat, cold, apex predators, and so much more!
data.short_description: Adapt. Survive. Thrive. In a world of ancient, prehistoric wonders you will have to learn to rely on your instincts as dinosaurs and poachers compete to SURVIVE PANGEA!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or AMD Radeon R9 280X series card or higher.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8 or above
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1080ti
  • Storage: 25 MB available space GB available space
